flexibleContent.content:
Pre-built, ready to deploy, fully supported—our Platform rapidly ingests and contextualises large, complex and disparate data sets in a single, unified place.
Already have a Data Platform, but want to enhance your analytics? No problem. Our Analytics are built to be platform-agnostic, thereby maximising your current data platform and investment.
flexibleContent.heading: Our Security Data Science Platform puts everything in one place.

flexibleContent.content: Our Platform empowers you to take control of your cyber Risk. It allows us to deploy trusted cyber solutions (at scale) within your organisation.
flexibleContent.heading: One, powerful Platform.

slides.content: Our Platform can be live in hours, and there’s no need for your team to support the Platform. We handle everything.
slides.heading: Deployed in hours

slides.content: Our Platform is built for the cloud and available on any of the major cloud providers.
slides.heading: Cloud agnostic

slides.content: There’s no restriction on the type of data that can be ingested.
slides.heading: Data-agnostic

slides.content: Designed to scale—our Platform is proven to perform on the largest data volumes. And with the most complex data science requirements.
slides.heading: Guaranteed performance

noteContent.text: We rapidly ingest large data volumes, without compromise.
We process, parse and index the data collected.
We securely store the data in a highly performant, flexible model.

flexibleContent.content: The Security Data Platform collects, processes and stores disparate data sets—on the cloud platform of your choice or on-premise.
flexibleContent.heading: The Security Data Platform.

flexibleContent.content: The Data Science Engine is a fully integrated analytics layer that lets data scientists develop solutions directly in the Platform, eliminating the need to develop models elsewhere.
flexibleContent.heading: The Data Science Engine.

noteContent.text: Our Data Science Engine provides a flexible data science environment that enables the development of interactive big data analytics. We analyse petabyte-scale security data using a range of data science approaches—rules and correlations, statistical and mathematical techniques, and machine learning.

flexibleContent.content: The Security Insight Workbench is a tightly integrated data visualisation layer that provides a powerful and flexible set of tools for visualising data science results.
flexibleContent.heading: The Security Insight Workbench.

noteContent.text: Our teams create powerful, data-driven, highly interactive visual analytics interfaces to contextualise and analyse security insights.

blocks.content: We provide a team of expert security data scientists, engineers and analysts to build perfectly tailored solutions—removing the need for our clients to find and train expensive, hard to find talent.
blocks.heading: Our Expertise

blocks.content: We bring out-of-the-box Analytics, ready to solve immediate challenges—then create tailored solutions to solve specific challenges (now and in the future).
blocks.heading: Our Analytics

footerCta.content: Our team of experts thrives when tackling complex cyber challenges. If you have one, we want to hear from you.
footerCta.heading: We seek the toughest cyber problems.

guides.guide: MSF Guide to UK Managed Security
Managed Security and 3rd Party Risk Opportunity

cta.content: Learn how we’re helping global organisations take control of their cyber technology.
cta.heading: What we do

items.summary: A single, unified place for complex, disparate data.
A team of data scientists, engineers and analysts.
Learn more about the team behind Prevalent AI.
Whitepapers, blog articles, podcasts and more.
